title: Move to Web3js version 4
body:
Web3js released version 4 (fully on the TypeScript)

It will be great to move on to the new version.

I've already started to do this. Here is [PR](https://github.com/ethereum/remix-project/pull/3951) 

I've finished integrating the latest version of wev3js@4x into remix-libs and tests passed. But I still have problems with some browser tests. As the project is huge and complex it would be better if someone familiar with all relations and connections inside the project would finish integration by fixing browser tests. From my side, I will provide any help you need from my knowledge of web3js@4.x library.

Here is a list of errors in a browser tests:
1. [remix-ide-browser-chrome-0-10-browser_test.sh](https://app.circleci.com/pipelines/github/ethereum/remix-project/16325/workflows/cbcb59c2-b37f-454c-8b2d-f1ae0fa22eed/jobs/185482)
```ts
Timed out while waiting for element <*[data-id="universalDappUiContractActionWrapper"]> to be present for 60000 milliseconds. - expected "found" but got: "not found" (60210ms)
```

2. [remix-ide-browser-chrome-1-10-browser_test.sh](https://app.circleci.com/pipelines/github/ethereum/remix-project/16325/workflows/cbcb59c2-b37f-454c-8b2d-f1ae0fa22eed/jobs/185495)
```ts
Timed out while waiting for element <[data-id="universalDappUiTitleExpander0"]> to be present for 10000 milliseconds. - expected "found" but got: "not found" (10232ms)
```
